pm_info: T-te lo puedo explicar a solas... s-si quieres...

eightball.help: Magic 8-ball. Returns a standard 8ball message, unless called with 'y/n', where it will return a less verbose answer.

about.description:
Esto es #BOTNAME: un bot de Telegram multiproposito con soporte para plugins.
Usa #C_START#COMMAND para ver todos los comandos disponibles.
about.version:
Basado en otouto v#VERSION de @topkecleon y modificado por @luksireiku.
otouto v2 esta licenciado bajo GPLv2.
topkecleon.github.io/otouto
luksireiku.github.io/petouto

bandersnatch.help: This is a Benedict Cumberbatch name generator.

bible.help:
Returns a verse from the bible, King James Version. Use a standard or abbreviated reference (John 3:16, Jn3:16).
http://biblia.com

btc.help:
Gives bitcoin prices for the given currency, and optionally conversion of an amount to and from that currency.
BitcoinAverage Price Index https://bitcoinaverage.com/

calc.help: This command solves math expressions and does conversion between common units. See mathjs.org/docs/expressions/syntax for a list of accepted syntax.

dice.help:
Roll a die. Use any positive number for range or use D&D notation.
Example: %{command_START}%{command} 4D100 will roll a 100-sided die four times.

dogify.help: Produces a doge image from dogr.io. Newlines are indicated by a forward slash. Words do not need to be spaced, but spacing is supported. Will post a previewed link rather than an image.

fortune.help: Get a random fortune from the UNIX fortune program.

gImages.help: This command performs a Google Images search for the given query. One random top result is returned. Safe search is enabled by default; use '%{command_START}insfw' to get potentially NSFW results.

gMaps.help: Sends location data for query, taken from Google Maps. Works for countries, cities, landmarks, etc.

gSearch.help: This command performs a Google search for the given query. Four results are returned. Safe search is enabled by default; use '%{command_START}gnsfw' to get potentially NSFW results. Four results are returned for a group chat, or eight in a private message.

giphy.help: Returns a random or search-resulted GIF from giphy.com. Results are limited to PG-13 by default; use '%{command_START}gifnsfw' to get potentially NSFW results.

hackernews.help: Returns some top stories from Hacker News. Four in a group or eight in a private message.

help.help: Get list of basic information for all commands, or more detailed documentation on a specified command.

hex.help: This function converts a number to or from hexadecimal.

imdb.help: This function retrieves the IMDb info for a given film or television series, including the year, genre, imdb rating, runtime, and a summation of the plot.

pokedex.help:
Get Pokedex information for a given Pokemon.
Includes national ID number, type, height, weight, and a description from a random regional dex.

pun.help:
Get a random pun.
Have a recommendation? PM @topkecleon.

reddit.help: This command returns top results for a given query or subreddit. NSFW posts are marked as such.

remind.help: Set a reminder for yourself. First argument is the number of minutes until you wish to be reminded.
remind.no_delay: The delay must be a number.
remind.reminder_set:
Your reminder has been set for #DELAY from now:
#TEXT

shrug.help:
Get a random pun.
Have a recommendation? PM @topkecleon.

time.help: Sends the time and timezone for a given location.

urbandictionary.help: Returns the first definition for a given term from Urban Dictionary.

weather.help:
Returns the current temperature and weather conditions for a specified location.
Non-city locations are accepted; '%{command_START}%{command} Buckingham Palace' will return the weather for Westminster.

whoami.help: Get the user ID for yourself and the group.
whoami.result: You are #FROM_NAME and you are messaging #TO_NAME.

xkcd.help: This command returns an xkcd strip, its number, and its 'secret' text. You may search for a specific strip or get a random one.
